content.en: Face enhancement algorithms: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to improve the quality of face images. These algorithms include sparse representation, non-local similarity dictionary learning, modified neighbor embedding, and more. By applying these algorithms, scientists aim to enhance face hallucination, super-resolution, and recognition in low-resolution images.
content.da: Ansigtsforbedringsalgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre kvaliteten af ansigtsbilleder. Disse algoritmer inkluderer sparsom repræsentation, ikke-lokal lighed ordboglæring, modificeret naboindlejringer og flere. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter videnskabsmænd mod at forbedre ansigtshallucination, superopløsning og genkendelse i billeder med lav opløsning.
